question: Chris was a pen pal with 9 people. He stopped being penpals with 3 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 10 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 12 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Chris is penpals with 9-3=<<9-3=6>>6 people
Thus he gets 6*4=<<6*4=24>>24 letters a week
So he writes 24*10=<<24*10=240>>240 pages a week
So he writes for 240*12=<<240*12=2880>>2880 minutes a week
So he writes 2880/60=<<2880/60=48>>48 hours a week
#### 48
